full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSKAL BZANG SANGS RGYAS STONG GI MTSAN BRJOD CING PHYAG 'TSAL BA'I TSUL DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I MTSAN BRJOD BSKAL BZANG RGYAN GYI PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019A *, ,DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I MTSAN BRJOD BSKAL BZANG RGYAN GYI PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA, KHA CHE'I PAndI TA SH'AKYA SHR'IS SBYAR BA RDZOGS SO,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,'GRO KUN SANGS RGYAS THOB PHYIR DU, ,DAD LDAN TSOGS BSOG SGRIB SBYONG MCHED, ,BDE GSHEGS MTSAN BRJOD GLEGS BAM 'DI, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED RGYUN DU SPEL,,
